sprint_plan.title: Project Documentation
sprint_plan.description: Create README.md, IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md, and HOW_TO_RUN.md for the project.

sprint_plan.title: UI Visualizations
sprint_plan.description: Create UI_SCREENSHOTS.html, a static HTML file simulating screenshots of key views.

sprint_plan.title: User Authentication Setup
sprint_plan.description: Implement user signup (email/password, Google Sign-In) and login functionality.

sprint_plan.title: Google OAuth Integration
sprint_plan.description: Integrate Google Sign-In for user authentication.

sprint_plan.title: User Profile Management API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for creating, retrieving, and updating user profiles (name, age, avatar).

sprint_plan.title: Profile Avatar Upload
sprint_plan.description: Implement functionality to upload and store user avatars in AWS S3.

sprint_plan.title: Parental Control API
sprint_plan.description: Implement API endpoints for parents to manage child account permissions and access.

sprint_plan.title: Signup and Login UI
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native UI components for user signup and login forms, including Google Sign-In button.

sprint_plan.title: Profile Setup UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop UI components for user profile creation and management (name, age, avatar upload).

sprint_plan.title: Parental Control UI
sprint_plan.description: Design and implement UI for parents to manage child account permissions.

sprint_plan.title: Family Calendar API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for adding, editing, deleting, and retrieving family calendar events.

sprint_plan.title: Event Assignment and Categorization API
sprint_plan.description: Implement API logic for assigning events to members and managing custom event categories with colors.

sprint_plan.title: Real-time Calendar Updates
sprint_plan.description: Integrate WebSockets (Socket.IO) to ensure real-time updates for shared family calendars.

sprint_plan.title: Calendar UI Components
sprint_plan.description: Develop React Native UI components for displaying the calendar in daily, weekly, and monthly views.

sprint_plan.title: Event Creation/Editing UI
sprint_plan.description: Build UI forms for adding, editing, and deleting calendar events, including assignment and category selection.

sprint_plan.title: Recurring Schedule API
sprint_plan.description: Implement API endpoints for creating and managing recurring events (daily, weekly, monthly) with end dates.

sprint_plan.title: Recurring Event Population Logic
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic to automatically populate recurring events on the calendar based on set schedules.

sprint_plan.title: Recurring Event UI Integration
sprint_plan.description: Update event creation/editing UI to support setting up recurring schedules.

sprint_plan.title: Task Management API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for creating, assigning, updating status, and retrieving tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Task Completion Tracking
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic to track task completion by children and visibility for parents.

sprint_plan.title: Task Creation UI
sprint_plan.description: Build UI for parents to create and assign tasks to specific children.

sprint_plan.title: Child Task View UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop UI for children to view their assigned tasks and mark them as completed.

sprint_plan.title: Gamified Rewards API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for defining rewards, assigning points to tasks, and tracking redemptions.

sprint_plan.title: Point Management Logic
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic for managing user points, deducting points for redemptions, and optional approval workflows.

sprint_plan.title: Rewards UI
sprint_plan.description: Create UI components for parents to define rewards and for children to view points balance and redeem rewards.

sprint_plan.title: Google Calendar Sync API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints to handle OAuth flow for Google Calendar and sync events.

sprint_plan.title: Event Synchronization Logic
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic for importing events from Google Calendar to FamilyFlow and exporting from FamilyFlow to Google Calendar.

sprint_plan.title: Google Calendar Sync UI
sprint_plan.description: Create UI elements for users to connect their Google Calendar and manage sync preferences.

sprint_plan.title: Event Notes and Location API
sprint_plan.description: Update event API to include fields for notes and location, and ensure data is saved and retrieved correctly.
sprint_plan.story_id: Add Notes and Details to Events

sprint_plan.title: Event Details UI Update
sprint_plan.description: Modify the event creation/editing and viewing UI to accommodate notes and location fields.
sprint_plan.story_id: Add Notes and Details to Events

sprint_plan.title: Parental Dashboard API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints to fetch aggregated data for the parental dashboard (upcoming events, pending tasks, points summary).

sprint_plan.title: Parental Dashboard UI
sprint_plan.description: Create the React Native UI for the parental dashboard, displaying summaries of events, tasks, and points.

sprint_plan.title: 21-Day Routine Builder API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for creating, managing, and tracking progress within the 21-Day Routine Builder.

sprint_plan.title: 21-Day Routine Builder UI
sprint_plan.description: Create UI components for accessing the routine builder, setting up routines, and visualizing daily progress.

sprint_plan.title: Co-Parent Invitation API
sprint_plan.description: Implement API endpoints for inviting and managing connections between co-parents within a family.

sprint_plan.title: Co-Parent Connection Logic
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic to establish shared access to calendar and task data for connected parents.

sprint_plan.title: Co-Parent Invitation UI
sprint_plan.description: Create UI for parents to send and accept co-parent invitations.

sprint_plan.title: Notification Service Setup
sprint_plan.description: Set up the notification service to handle push notifications for events and tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Notification Trigger Logic
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic to trigger notifications for upcoming events, new tasks, and deadlines.

sprint_plan.title: Notification Preferences UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop UI components for users to manage their notification preferences.

sprint_plan.title: Custom Categories API
sprint_plan.description: Implement API endpoints for creating and managing custom event and task categories.

sprint_plan.title: Custom Categories UI Integration
sprint_plan.description: Update UI for event and task creation to allow selection and creation of custom categories.

sprint_plan.title: In-App Messaging API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for sending and receiving simple messages between parent and child.

sprint_plan.title: In-App Messaging UI
sprint_plan.description: Create a simple messaging interface within the app for parents to send messages to children.

sprint_plan.title: Advanced Reward Customization API
sprint_plan.description: Update reward API to support setting different point values for tasks and configuring approval workflows.

sprint_plan.title: Advanced Reward Customization UI
sprint_plan.description: Enhance the rewards UI for parents to configure advanced reward settings.

sprint_plan.title: Advanced Analytics API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints to provide data for advanced analytics reports (time allocation, trends, spending).

sprint_plan.title: Advanced Analytics UI
sprint_plan.description: Create a dedicated 'Analytics' section in the UI for premium users to view reports.

sprint_plan.title: Subscription Payment Gateway Integration
sprint_plan.description: Integrate a secure payment gateway (e.g., Stripe) for processing monthly subscriptions.

sprint_plan.title: Subscription Management API
sprint_plan.description: Develop API endpoints for managing subscription plans, user subscription status, and payment processing.

sprint_plan.title: Subscription UI
sprint_plan.description: Create UI components for users to select subscription plans and manage their subscription status.
